p: On day 19, blood were collected from the jugular vein at 0, 2.5, and 6 h after the morning feeding by trained personnel using a vacuum serum tube (5 mL, Aosaite medical instrument Co., LTD, Heze, China). Blood without anticoagulant was allowed to clot for 1 h at room temperature and was then centrifuged at 3000× g for 10 min at 4 °C. All serum samples were free of hemolysis and were frozen at −20 °C until analyzed for serum metabolites by Mindray BS-230 Chemistry Analyzer (Shenzhen, China). The blood biochemical indexes included glucose (GLU), total protein (TP), albumin (ALB), globulin (GLB), triglyceride (TG), and total cholesterol (TC).
